description:
Perfect for the garage DIYer or a small shop, the HHP-3 is a simple design for installation of head cups from 1 to 1½ inches, and one-piece bottom bracket cups.

  • Also presses BB30 and BB90 (BB86, or BB92) system cups
  • Thread is 5/8in. (16mm) diameter (nominally 16mm) works to press BMX bottom brackets
  • Maximum working length of 385mm
name: Park Tool HHP-3 Home Mechanic Bearing Cup Press
